GSD.description:
scsi: lpfc: Move cfg_log_verbose check before calling lpfc_dmp_dbg()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 271725e4028559ae7974d762a8467dc9de412f2e. For more details please see the references link.
